titleStmt.title: A commentary vpon the prophecie of Isaiah. By Mr. Iohn Caluin. Whereunto are added foure tables ... Translated out of French into English: by C.C.
Commentarii in Isaiam prophetam. English
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
Cotton, Clement.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, and are to be sold by William Cotton, dwelling in Pater noster Row, at the signe of the golden Lion,

notesStmt.note: A translation of "Commentarii in Isaiam prophetam".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pater noster Row, at the signe of the golden Lion
